attributes.action: All bankers bonuses should be compulsorily donated to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: All Investment Bankers Bonuses should be compulsorily donated to the NHS. Bankers would be given an oxfam style gift card showing where the money would be spent. Bankers bonuses are about 12 Billion every year,  the NHS  has to save about 20 Billion over 5 years, we should take their money and this would plug the NHS in two years then we are saving money for the NHS.
